data.title: 准备以至少20秒的时间回答以下问题
data.answer: The major reason for the loss of habitats of plants and animals is human activities. Human beings have been building human habitats by constructing cities and industrial areas which are totally opposed to nature. In a bird's eye view, human habitats keep invading the greens, thus the animals' habitats. In addition, the demand for some animals and some plants has resulted unbalance in the ecosystem and resulted in the loss of habitats of plants and animals.
data.referenceText: What are some causes of the loss of habitats of plants and animals in your country?
data.referenceTranslate: 你的国家的动植物栖息地丧失的原因是什么?
